keywords: ['african music', 'gospel', 'trumpets', 'upbeat', 'vibrant', 'electric bass guitar', 'bongo drums', 'intricate drum pattern', 'wooden percussion instrument', 'electric keyboard', 'mellow groove', 'medium tempo']
caption: This is a live performance by an African music group in a gospel style. The drum pattern is intricate and there are other percussive elements like an occasional bongo and a wooden percussion instrument. The melodic elements are the vintage sounding electric piano  as well as the vibrant and fun brass melody played on the trumpets.
